name: Plasteroïd
description:
Plasteroïd is the first game that I made with Python. The assets are realized with Inkscape. The goal is similar to the game asteroïds, just eliminate the asteroïds, make a maximum point and not get destroyed.

Controls:                                                 

up arrow --> to accelerate 

down arrow --> to decelerate

left and right arrow --> to go to the left and right
